menu.allergenNote: Please ask our team about allergens and dietary requirements.

saj-wraps.name: SAJ Wraps
saj-wraps.description: Thin, crispy Lebanese flatbread cooked on a saj griddle

honey-roasted-halloumi.name: Honey Roasted Halloumi
honey-roasted-halloumi.description: With roasted cherry tomatoes and fresh thyme

shrimp-saj-crostini.name: Shrimp Saj Crostini
shrimp-saj-crostini.description: Crispy saj rounds topped with tabbouleh, sautéed shrimp, and lemon zest

shish-barak.name: Shish Barak
shish-barak.description: Fried minced beef dumplings sautéed in chili paste, served over garlicky yogurt and caramelized onions, with roasted almonds

kebab-pistachio.name: Kebab Pistachio
kebab-pistachio.description: Minced meat with pistachios and house spices, sautéed in pomegranate molasses. Served with hummus

chicken-rolls.name: Chicken Rolls
chicken-rolls.description: Mousakhan - crispy saj rolls filled with shredded chicken, caramelized onions and sumac. Served with a yogurt dip

falafel-bites.name: Falafel Bites
falafel-bites.description: Chickpea balls served with mixed veggies, bread crumbles and tahini dressing

cheese-rolls.name: Cheese Rolls
cheese-rolls.description: Crispy pastry filled with cheese and parsley

spinach-artichoke-gratin.name: Spinach & Artichoke Gratin
spinach-artichoke-gratin.description: Oven-baked creamy dip, served hot with melted parmesan and mozzarella

muhamara.name: Muhamara
muhamara.description: Roasted red pepper dip, walnuts, tahini, pomegranate molasses and a hint of chili

hummus.name: Hummus
hummus.description: Creamy chickpeas dip, topped with pomegranate seeds

feta-brulee.name: Feta Brûlée
feta-brulee.description: Creamy feta mix with mild chili, finished with a crisp caramelized sugar crust

labneh-plus.name: Labneh+
labneh-plus.description: Creamy strained yogurt mixed with diced veggies and olives

fatoush.name: Fatoush
fatoush.description: Romaine, parsley, mint, tomato, cucumber, bell pepper, green onion, radish, crispy bread, tangy dressing

tabbouleh.name: Tabbouleh
tabbouleh.description: Parsley, tomato, mint, green onion, lemon-oil dressing

caesar.name: Caesar
caesar.description: Marinated chicken, romaine, parmesan, croutons, caesar dressing

shawarma.name: Shawarma
shawarma.description: Beef with fries, onion and parsley salad, tomato, pickles, tahini dressing and saj bread

salmon.name: Salmon
salmon.description: Grilled with tahini sauce mixed with diced red and green bell pepper, coriander, served with sautéed baby potatoes

chicken-breast.name: Chicken Breast
chicken-breast.description: House marinated and grilled, served with sautéed baby potatoes, cherry tomatoes and yogurt-herb sauce

lasagna.name: Lasagna
lasagna.description: Chili made with beef and pork ragu, melted parmesan and mozzarella

lebanese-burger.name: Lebanese Burger
lebanese-burger.description: Two smash patties, coleslaw, fries, pickles, ketchup & mustard in a toasted bun. Served with fries and coleslaw

tiramisu.name: Tiramisu
tiramisu.description: To share - mascarpone, pasteurized eggs, savoiardi, a touch of kahlua, cocoa powder

znoud-el-set.name: Znoud el Set
znoud-el-set.description: Crispy baklava sheets, sweet cream filling (ashta), sugar syrup, pistachio

pain-perdu.name: Pain Perdu
pain-perdu.description: To share - oven-baked soaked French toast with a drizzle of caramel

saj-its-thyme.name: It's Thyme
saj-its-thyme.description: Zaatar mix, tomato, cucumber, mint, olives

saj-turkey-cheese.name: Turkey and Cheese
saj-turkey-cheese.description: Smoked turkey, melted cheese, lettuce, tomato, pickles, mayo-mustard dressing

saj-halloumi-bacon.name: Halloumi Bacon
saj-halloumi-bacon.description: Melted halloumi and white cheese, crispy bacon, tomato, pickles, mayo

saj-what-the-feta.name: What the Feta
saj-what-the-feta.description: Creamy feta, tomato, arugula, onion, basil, zaatar

saj-roasted-veggies.name: Roasted Veggies
saj-roasted-veggies.description: Roasted eggplant and zucchini, red pepper paste, sweet potato chips, pomegranate seeds, parsley, tahini dressing

cocktail-mediterranean-gt.name: Mediterranean G&T
cocktail-mediterranean-gt.description: Mediterranean gin, lillet, lime, tonic water

cocktail-azeitona-cafe.name: Azeitona Cafe
cocktail-azeitona-cafe.description: Vodka, coffee liqueur, espresso, olive oil, olives

cocktail-marie-antoinette.name: Marie-Antoinette
cocktail-marie-antoinette.description: Vodka, passion fruit, St. Germain, vanilla, tonka beans

beer-clay-cold.name: Clay Cold
beer-clay-cold.description: Blonde, lemon, salt. Served in a cold clay cup
